param.name: whost
param.label: Workflow host
param.help: Use PoolName.clusters.pw for cloud clusters or user@host_ip otherwise

param.name: rundir
param.label: Run directory
param.help: Path to the job directory on the host. In general, the compute nodes have access to this directory.

param.name: runcmd
param.label: Run command
param.help: Name of the script or command to run from inside the run directory

param.name: head_or_worker
param.label: Which type of node to run on?
param.help: Select whether to run on the head node or a worker node
